dcterms:creator: W.-C. Lo
C.-L. Fan
J. Lee
C.-Y. Huang
K.-T. Chen
C.-H. Hsu
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 50 users watching 10 YouTube 360 degree videos, sampled at 30 frames-per-second, with data recorded for 1800 frames corresponding to 1 minute of playback. Each frame consists of 200 tiles, forming a 10×20 grid in the equirectangular projection.
dcterms:title: 360° video viewing dataset in head-mounted virtual reality
